short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Contact Finder is an app that uses natural language processing to read web pages to establish contact information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Contact Finder is an app that uses natural language processing to read web pages to establish contact information. This information can then be exported to your favourite CRM.
